title: I liked the old Guardian Angel much better
body:
It was a great option for champions like Aatrox. Especially if you found yourself in as situation where you had to build a lot of damage such as{{item:3153}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3812}} and the enemy team has near equal amounts of AD and AP threats. 

I dunno, the fact that it gives AD now is super weird and feels wrong as a concept. Armor gives AD? So, should swords give Armor?

replies.body: It was stupid that AD champs didn't have an item that gives armor and AD when they had items that gave AD and MR. IT was stupid for GA to give tank stats when it was meant for carries. They fixed both problems.
The problem is every damn adc and assassin is buying it now and so I've got like 4 people on the enemy team with revives. I think it needs to be more expensive or something.
Yeah? So what number or evidence can you show me that the new GA changed anything?

I, uh, never claimed it did. Im just saying that there was a need for a certain type of item, which the GA now fills, and that the stats on the old GA didn't fit the main people who actually built it, which it now does. Balancing around that is more Riot's problem than mine at the moment.

I hate the new GA sooooo much.

1. I hated teams that stacked GA originally. Fighting vs 3 GAs is stupid.
2. Now only certain teams can stack GA, so it is even worse! At least back then we could stack GA back. But now instead they are rushing GA and we don't use AD so it is like ha enjoy your Zhonya or Banshee.. .ok. 
Seriously 3GA vs 3Ga was disgusting. But now 3 GA vs 1Ga is just terrible.
You obviously have a closed mind this was to help the adcs even be viable riot must not of like the idea or more mages like Ziggs replacing adcs so they are trying to make them viable
They were plenty viable before. In fact every team NEEDED one at bot. So who were they not viable?
When the 8-0 Caitlynn means nothing to the 3-2 Zed there is an issue for the adcs in this Meta main adc and watch how you being fed means nothing to any assassin who arent feeding their ass off
